caption: Nice ambiance, great service. I had the farm veggie pizza, good flavor but definitely skimpy on the toppings considering its an $11 personal size pizza. Like a few tiny broccoli on top.. As an entree the salad is on the small side as well.  Overall positive experience still.
Everything is made fresh, everything tastes fresh. Definitely check them out.
Great atmosphere, yummy pizza, good beer and wine selections, not to mention super nice and helpful employees!!! Will definitely be coming back!! Highly recommend checking this place out!

Amazing service and food. Woodhaus is the perfect place to relax and enjoy yourself with friends or family! Their pizza dough is one of the best I have ever had and I really like the creative appetizers they have here. You can tell that …
